data.what_is: Cross-channel messaging platform to drive personalized, targeted and effective campaigns across any channel - email, sms, mobile apps, social, fax, print, and voice.
data.product_description: Cross-channel messaging platform to drive personalized, targeted and effective campaigns across any channel - email, sms, mobile apps, social, fax, print, and voice.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Brick Street CONNECT?
It includes everything you need for marketing automation. The best thing for all business enterprises to do is to use AI to make their marketing and sales efforts easier.
Brick Street CONNECT includes a variety of connectors and functions that allow it to track and manage all of your client connection and advertising platforms.
Additionally, there are integrating features that make it simple to import and handle content from many websites and applications. Data migration becomes efficient and simple.
For instance, managing email marketing, SMS, social media post marketing, and other tasks becomes simple.

What do you dislike about Brick Street CONNECT?
Here, a very tiny lagging issue is identified and felt as a result of internet connectivity issues. as when the interface and screen freeze.

What problems is Brick Street CONNECT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Brick Street CONNECT has been most helpful in automating our marketing and advertising tasks, and it has performed best for us in cross-communication with our clients and post visitors. handling our many campaigns interfaces and responding quickly to them.

initial_reviews.review_title: A good experience in good budget
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Brick Street CONNECT?
I liked the way they handle their customers and the way they support them 24/7. I also liked their pricing structure because it is better than others. hence recommended for all.

What do you dislike about Brick Street CONNECT?
They can furthermore reduce their cost because there are some other companies that are offering the same services at slightly low prices. Even though they are good but they need to focus on some customers perspectives

What problems is Brick Street CONNECT solving and how is that benefiting you?
it is running marketing campaigns for me on mobile. they are good in that area, as they know which market and service should be given in which areas. Also, they have good research team that provide valuable suggestions.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Brick Street CONNECT?
It is a brilliant tool for targeted campaigns. Its algorithm is highly optimized for both SMS and Email targeting. The UI is quite easy to use. Support is great and its biggest plus point I that it is very affordable.

What do you dislike about Brick Street CONNECT?
Not much to dislike but they need to improve their targeting algorithm for social media, especially for cross-site tracking. The insights from the campaign run are also a bit buggy at times.

What problems is Brick Street CONNECT solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is helping us find the right audience and deliver tailor-made product and marketing communication to them straight to the Inbox. These are highly personalized one-on-one communique.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Brick Street CONNECT?
It's an excellent platform for driving effective and targeted campaigns across SMS, emails, mobile apps, fax, voice, and even print option. It offers fast connectivity with everyone very easily, efficiently, and quickly. Additionally, Brick Street CONNECT provides end-to-end solutions designed for Web App.

What do you dislike about Brick Street CONNECT?
The only issue I found while using Brick Street CONNECT is that there is no training available to support beginners.

Recommendations to others considering Brick Street CONNECT:
Go for this easy-to-use software without a second thought.

What problems is Brick Street CONNECT solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am using Brick Street CONNECT for resolving knowledge management issues at my workplace apart from dashboard management and customer segmentation.
Also, this software helps us in effective communication management along with personalisation.
